entry.title: Install NVIDIA CUDA on an AWS Ubuntu g4dn server

link.title: Install NVIDIA CUDA on an AWS Ubuntu g4dn server

entry.summary: NVIDIA CUDA installation is required to work with NVIDIA GPUs. If you are working on machine learning projects, installing CUDA for your GPU enabled server is a necessary first step.

entry.title: Install Docker from docker repository on an AWS Ubuntu server

entry.summary: We are going to install docker from docker repository on an AWS Ubuntu server. The steps given here are as per the official docker installation document

entry.title: Transfer Learning from a Clara Train Model using MONAI

link.title: Transfer Learning from a Clara Train Model using MONAI

entry.summary: In this post, I will demonstrate how to train a spleen segmentation model starting with a pretrained model available in NVIDIA GPU cloud. In this demo MONAI official example is used as reference.

entry.title: Building and Deploying A Spleen Segmentation app using MONAI App Packager(MAP) and MONAI Inference Service (MIS)

link.title: Building and Deploying A Spleen Segmentation app using MONAI App Packager(MAP) and MONAI Inference Service (MIS)

entry.summary: In this post, I will build and deploy a spleen segmentation AI model provider by MONAI, in a AWS environment. The inference service can invoked over HTTP with paylod and the service will produce segmention file for visualization.
